summary: TBBP meshes for 7BSeveNBase UNP R18Pn 08 Lingerie Set
descriptionHtml:
Author: ezrider57
Version: 1.0
Date: 3/29/2014

This mod is a conversion of R18Pn 08 - Lingerie Set for 7BSeveNBase UNP by KURESE. It adds SeveNBase TBBP weighted meshes to the base mod using BodySlide 2 Outfit Studio. This mod is Meshes only.

It is TBBP,BBP,HDT compatible. You must have a TBBP compatible skeleton or you will CTD. You must have TBBP animations or HDT Havok Physics Extensions to see stuff jiggle! :)


Requirements:

It requires the original mod - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52168
TBBP compatible skeleton. Like XP32's XP32 Maximum Skeleton - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800
TBBP animations or HDT Havok Physics Extensions. Technically you don't have to have them but there's no need to use this mod if you don't...



Install (Manual only)
---------------------
Install R18Pn 08 - Lingerie Set for 7BSeveNBase UNP by KURESE.
Extract this archive to any folder and then copy the contents to Skyrim's Data folder, yes to overwrite files.

Removal (Manual only)
---------------------
These files will be removed when the base mod is removed.


Disclaimers:

This is my first uploaded conversion, I'm still learning how to use the Outfit Studio. BACKUP your files before using this mod!!!
If you don't like how it looks or it doesn't work for you, copy original meshes back over these.

Known Issues:

None so far. I have done in-game testing on my game and it's settings only. Did not see any clipping for the poses I used. Your experience may vary.


All Credit go to the original authors:

-Caliente's Bodyslide 2 and Outfit Studio, so easy to use even a n00b can do it.
-KURESE for the original mod
-Sevennity for SeveNBase1 body
-DeMoNhUnTeR1986 for SeveNBase TBBP meshes
author: ezrider57
